scripts.ci: dotnet r build && dotnet r test
scripts.publishSingleFullWindows: dotnet r publishCLI && dotnet r publishWindows
scripts.publishWindows: dotnet publish MakeBookWin/MakeBookWin.csproj -c debug -r win-x64 --sc true -o releaseWin -p:PublishSingleFile=true
scripts.publishCLI: dotnet publish MakeBookCLI/MakeBookCLI.csproj -c debug -r win-x64 --sc true -o releaseWinCLI -p:PublishSingleFile=true
scripts.release: dotnet r build && dotnet r publishSingleFull
